article.body: MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE Government bonds aren't the hedges they used to be, with monetary policy on steroids, says HSBC Global Asset Management strategist. See full story.Pelosi rejects idea of a stand-alone fiscal stimulus measures Hopes for a restart of talks over a large scale economic stimulus package, or even more targeted aid for the troubled airline industry, took a big hit Thursday after House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she still wanted a bigger bargain.
